channel.title: [[Need help with disabling spawn for some items]]
channel.description:
Ok, so title says all,
If i like want to disable a ags from bieing spawned, how do i add this?

item.title: [[Need help with disabling spawn for some items]]
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

server side…
find config.java

open config.java and add this

public static final String[] UNSPAWNABLE = { "torva", "pernix", "virtus", "divine", "elysian", "dragon claws", "vesta", "statius", "morrigan", "zuriel", "bandos", "armadyl", "godsword", "chaotic", "primal","vigour", "null", "partyhat", "h'ween", "santa", "korasi", "handcannon", "party", "corrupt", "cracker", "3rd", "light", "visage", "dragonfire", "third", "broken", "deg", "scroll", "spectral", "arcane", "rigour", "tasset", "coin", "(i)", "void", "dice", "scythe", "bunny", "disk of returning", "die", "dice bag", "dragon defender", "abyssal vine whip", "abyssal whip", "agile top", "agile legs", "frost dragon mask", "frog mask", "jack lantern mask", "'perfect' ring" };

feel free to put more item unspawnable by doing this … ,"???" ???=name of item you wanna make it unspawnable

Read full topic
item.source: [[Need help with disabling spawn for some items]]
